name: TSN-Media
tagline: Web design and development for your business
description:
Founded in 2011, TSN-Media is outsourcing company which provides comprehensive services in the field of web development and outstaffing for digital agencies.
TSN-Media cooperates with digital agencies from United States, Australia, Canada, Europe, South Africa and specializes in such areas:
Web Development (in complex or any separate elements);
UI/UX Web Design, Graphic Design;
Other services (Outstaffing, Dedicated programmers or team and other).
Web Development (a complex or any separate elements) we provide:
Blogs
Corporate sites
E-commerce sites
Landing pages
Community sites
Responsive sites
Mobile applications (hybrid cross-platform Android & iOS)
Custom admin panel for mobile applications
 TSN-Media skills:
Programming, Markup, Stylesheet Languages: PHP, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, AngularJS, NodeJS, ReactJS HTML 5, CSS 3, Less, Sass
Content management systems (CMS): WordPress, Magento, Drupal, 
PHP Frameworks: Symfony 2, Laravel, Yii, Codeigniter / Kohana, Zend, CakePHP
Database management systems (DBMS): MySQL, PostgreSQL
Version Control Systems (VCS): Git (via Bitbucket), GitLab, GitHub, SVN
Platform as a Service (PAAS): Amazon Web Services, Rackspace Cloud, DigitalOcean, WP Engine
APIs Integration: PayPal,FedEx, Braintree, Google Maps/Places, MailChimp, etc.
TSN-Media is a team of professionals which turn your ideas in a quality code and successful result.
